function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Data charting and collection involving multiple individuals in close contact.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through close contact during data collection","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate early detection due to reliance on limited physiological indicators leading to delayed diagnosis.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Radiation exposure risks from chest radiography imaging for covid-19 diagnosis.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in conducting diagnostic test accuracy systematic review","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary closure of access points may lead to altered behavior of individuals, potentially increasing the risk of non-compliance with safety measures.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of the disease through shared facilities and units","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared article downloads and access to online library resources.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in struggling economies and highly infected countries","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of multiple sectors to the impacts of contagious diseases","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on health in the built environment","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Involving a large number of individuals in the decision-making process may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases, especially during in-person meetings or consultations.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of likert rating system involving 25 participants may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases if gathering in person.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid development in the sectors of construction and the built environment may lead to inadequate consideration of contagious disease propagation risk.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in off-site construction may lead to a higher risk of contagious diseases transmission due to transportation of materials and workers from various locations.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid shelter construction and emergency constructions may lead to overcrowding and inadequate ventilation, increasing the risk of airborne contagious diseases transmission.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of high population density on the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to population density and compact design in built environments.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-person teaching conferences, morbidity and mortality conferences, and simulation labs are being avoided due to the covid-19 pandemic, leading to a decrease in resident case volume.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases through in-person meetings if precautions are not strictly followed.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants attending remotely due to self-quarantining and mandated staffing changes","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Trainees making initial contact with patients for telehealth consultations","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical examination in telehealth consultations","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in time in the operating room","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of contagious diseases due to increased interconnectedness and decentralization of society.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to lack of containment measures","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through medical data exchange","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of transmission of contagious diseases through the digital signature validation process","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with millions infected from over 185 countries/regions.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High mortality rate with over 200,000 deceased from covid-19.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global circulation of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to accommodate increasing covid-19 cases in hospitals","category":"Lack of Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized timing for assessment of anxiety levels post-exergame sessions","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited support for the idea that physical activity helps reduce disease severity","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overexertion and injury from improper exercise technique or excessive activity.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for mutations and evolution of the sars-cov-2 virus in human and animal hosts","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High similarity between sars-cov-2 and bat coronaviruses","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High mortality rates of known coronaviruses mers-cov, sars-cov","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Asymptomatic and flu-like symptoms of sars-cov-2","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge on procedures to prevent the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Failure to implement preventive infection","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
